topicTitle: Ban for the Enemy Boat... Who just so happens to be Giant?

posts.postText:
Offender name?: Giant Enemy Boat

Which Server?: TTT

Offender's Steam ID?: Giant Enemy Boat has left. ID: STEAM_0:0:21801139

What the Offender did?: He and another person would team up and rdm some kid by calling him out every round... if no one killed him, they would do so. Note that I was only able to get one of them so... v.v In any case, In the picture... What happen was in the round that I did take snapshots of. He killed that same kid as detective... when I asked him why, He killed me 3 seconds later v.v
Admins on?: VIP/ME... So none T.T

Proof?: http://i464.photobucket.com/albums/rr9/sohisohi/hl22011-05-1602-00-28-42.jpg
http://i464.photobucket.com/albums/rr9/sohisohi/hl22011-05-1602-00-30-18.jpg

I hope screenshots count as proof T.T

accepted.
edit: EB is being really slow.. when an another admin sees this, go on EB and ban him for 24 hours then lock this.
